publication.keyword: Agent Systems;Link Quality;Quality of Service;Resource Availability;Resource Utilization;Spectral Efficiency;Synergistic Effect;Wireless Communication;Base Station;
publication.abstract: Cooperation in wireless communications is an at- tractive means to gain spectral efficiency or diversity. Typically, cooperation is studied at the level of an individual end-to-end link. On the other hand, the primary goal of the the protocol proposed herein is not the improvement of individual link quality, but rather to improve global resource utilization throughout the network in the
